title: The Magical Butts of Tiny Tina's Wonderlands
description:
We're ditching the gruesome violence of the Borderlands franchise in exchange for the whimsical violence of Tiny Tina's Wonderlands; an exchange that then inspires us to reinvent Doom for an all-ages audience. 

Also discussed: The Afterparty, Dragon Quest V, Bloons TD 6+, All in the Timing
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Russ Frushtick, Chris Plante, Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy)
